means: 登上王座（throne的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: The new king is throned today.
She was throned upon a large, antique gold chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的王座是一张很大的古式金椅.

sentence.Network_en: The prince was to be throned as the new leader.
sentence.Network_cn: 王子将继承王位成为新的领导人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Who will be the next person to be throned ?, 下一个被加冕的人会是谁?

汉语词汇中也常用九来形容帝王将相的称谓，如九五之尊（imperial throne）；称官位仅次于皇帝的王爷为九千岁等。根据阴阳五行 …
